typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source
source filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> GetFilteredData
GetFilteredData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['moviesDb.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
